text: Læa pord di thrng kahnd khwam di hı kæ phwk kha phraxngkh nı lok ni læa nı prlok dwy thæcring phwk kha phraxngkh sanuk phid læa klab mayang phraxngkh læw phraxngkh tras wa kar lngthosʹ khxng kha nan kha ca hı man prasb kæ phu thi kha prasngkh læa kar xendu metta khxng kha nan kwangkhwang thaw thuk sing sung kha ca kahnd man hı kæ brrda phu thi yakerng læa chara sa kat læa kæ brrda phu thi phwk khea sraththa tx brrda xongkar khxng rea
